title: marudagiri muruganin
sahitya:
marudagiri muruganin tirunAmattinai nI maravAdirukkum mati peruvAi manamE


anupallavi

  marumaikkum immaikkum mAperum phalan tarum arumaiyAna marundadu AdalAl sirandadu


caraNam    eTTAda poruLukkEn EngiyEngi vINil koTTAvi viTTu nI puNpaTTu vIngavENum
kaTTODu viTTODum un kaSTangaL ellAm maTTillA magizvODu mAnilattil OngalAm
